  1. Home
  2. Departments

Departments

9 1 1 2

  1. Administration

    The Administration Department is made up of the City Manager, City Secretary, Assistant to the City Manager, City Attorney, Finance Officer and the Human Resources Coordinator.

  2. Code Enforcement

  3. Community Development

  4. Electric

  5. Finance

    The City Manager and Finance Officer are responsible for the financial records of the City including recording and reporting financial transactions, maintaining permanent accounting records, preparation of the annual financial report.

  6. Fire

  7. Garage

  8. Human Resources

    Find an employment application and a link to job openings in the City of Livingston.

  9. Livingston Municipal Library

  10. Main Street

    Livingston Main Street was established in 2005.

  11. Municipal Airport

  12. Municipal Court

    The Livingston Municipal Court is responsible for Class C misdemeanors, Animal Control Violations, Code Enforcement Violations and other state and city ordinance violations punishable by fines only.

  13. Parks & Recreation

    Learn about the events held by the Parks and Recreation department.

  14. Police

  15. Public Works

  16. Sanitation

    The city has contracted with Waste Services to provide twice weekly curbside collection of residential garbage and trash. Learn about trash pickup and what fees apply.

  17. Trade Days

    Trade Days is held monthly in Pedigo Park, which is conveniently located just 2/10 mile off the 59 corridor, in the center of Livingston, Texas, one hour north of Houston Intercontinental Airport and one hour south of Lufkin.

  18. Utilities

    The City of Livingston provides and bills for electricity, water, sewer and garbage service. Find out how to apply for service and find rates.
